attributes.action: To bring the Hillsborough law to fall power and to stop the coverup of disasters
attributes.background:
I would like the government and parliament to bring in the fall Hillsborough law and not just a watered down one we need justice for people that has been affected by cover ups 
JFT97

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the Public Office (Accountability) Bill (Hillsborough Law) but we're not sure exactly what you mean by "full power" and "watered down one".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to avoid a "watered down" Bill. For example, what you would like to be included in the Bill.
